mujib_definition: The struggle this time is for our emancipation. The struggle this time is for our independence - Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman delivering his historic 7th March Speech at a huge public rally at Race Course Maidan (Suhrawardy Udyan, March 7, 1971). This 19 minutes-speech has been included in the MEMORY OF THE WORLD INTERNATIONAL REGISTER as a Documentary Heritage of UNESCO.
